meta_title: Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177 – “by Orfina” Dial Variant
meta_description: Discover the distinctive “by Orfina” dial variant of the Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177 featuring a black matte PVD dial, red-tipped airplane shaped chronograph minute hand, official Orfina branding, and powered by the reliable Lemania 5100 caliber. An iconic military model from the 1980s Porsche Design collaboration.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7177 by Orfina dial, Military Chronograph black dial, Porsche Design PVD chronograph, Lemania 5100 watch, red-tipped minute hand, vintage military chronograph, Orfina Porsche Design collaboration, 1980s chronograph watch

list.text:
The “by Orfina” stamped military dials are identical to those of the
baseline configuration but bear an additional line of text “by Orfina” at 4
o’clock.

These dials are the last iteration of any Orfina Porsche Design dial, with
Orfina branding.
